name: Baketa Real-time Game Translation
description: Windows-specific real-time text translation overlay application for games. Uses OCR technology and AI translation to provide high-performance game translation tools.

response_language.requirement: ALL responses must be in Japanese

layers: Baketa.Core - Platform-independent core functionality and abstractions
Baketa.Application - Business logic and feature integration

quality_standards.solution_approach: Root cause solutions, not surface-level fixes

communication_guidelines.technical_documentation: English for international compatibility, Japanese explanations
communication_guidelines.business_logic: Japanese domain knowledge preserved when needed
communication_guidelines.response_format: All Claude Code responses must be in Japanese

development_philosophy.core_principle: 根本原因解決 (Root Cause Solutions)

workflow_optimization.auto_approve_session: Use Shift+Tab for 'Yes, and don't ask again this session'
workflow_optimization.command_templates: Use project scripts for consistent execution
workflow_optimization.error_handling: Collect errors, analyze root cause, implement fundamental fixes

required_steps: Check code analysis warnings: dotnet build --verbosity normal | findstr warning
mandatory_post_implementation.report_format: ✅ 実装完了チェック結果: コンパイルエラー/警告/テスト結果を明記
